requirement_text:
As a doctor, I want to be able to write prescriptions for patients so that I can provide appropriate medication.
As a doctor, I want to be able to automatically transfer prescriptions to pharmacy information systems so that prescriptions can be processed efficiently.
As a patient, I want to be able to view prescriptions written by doctors so that I can use them as a reference when visiting a pharmacy.
As a pharmacist, I want to be able to view transferred prescriptions so that I know what medication patients need.
As a patient, I want to be able to edit my personal information online so that my information is up to date.
As a system administrator, I want all data to be stored in a central database so that discrepancies between departments are reduced.
As a system administrator, I want electronic medical records to be integrated with the management system so that patient medical information is digitally available.
As a doctor, I want to be able to view a patient’s medical history so that I can make informed medical decisions.
As a doctor, I want to be able to view a patient’s personal information so that I can correctly identify and treat the patient.
As a nurse, I want to be able to view a patient’s medical history so that I can support medical treatment.
As a nurse, I want to be able to view a patient’s personal information so that I can correctly identify patients.
As a nurse, I want to be able to record notes about patients so that patient care information is documented.
As a receptionist, I want to be able to view a patient’s electronic medical record so that I have the information needed to contact the patient.
As a receptionist, I want to be able to schedule appointments so that patient visits can be organized.
As a patient, I want to be able to schedule appointments online on a personal computer so that I can arrange visits conveniently.
As a doctor, I want mobile devices to be integrated with electronic medical records so that data collected on mobile devices is stored centrally.
As a patient, I want to be able to request new prescriptions through online appointment scheduling so that I can manage my medication remotely.
As a systems analyst, I want clinical data to be collected so that prescriptive and predictive analytics can be performed.
As a systems analyst, I want to have access to collected clinical data so that prescriptive and predictive analytics can be performed.
As a systems analyst, I want to be able to view bed occupancy data so that analytics can be performed on hospital capacity.
As a systems analyst, I want to be able to view room scheduling data so that analytics can be performed.
As a systems analyst, I want to be able to view employee schedules so that predictive analytics can be used to estimate staffing needs.
As a system administrator, I want all data viewed by systems analysts to be anonymized so that patient privacy is ensured.
As a system administrator, I want the system to comply with GDPR standards so that stored data is protected.
As a doctor, I want patients to be restricted from viewing information that is not intended for them so that security risks are minimized.
As a system administrator, I want to be able to restrict system components from being viewed by patients so that unauthorized access is prevented.
As a system administrator, I want to be able to grant different access levels to system users so that functionalities can be restricted appropriately.
As a patient, I want to be able to access the parts of my electronic medical record that the hospital allows so that I can view my medical information.
As a patient, I want to be able to view my test results once they are available so that I am informed about my health status.
As a patient, I want to be able to access and view my electronic medical record on a mobile device so that I can view my data anywhere.
As a patient, I want to be able to schedule appointments on a mobile device so that I can manage appointments conveniently.
As a patient, I want to be able to request new prescriptions on a mobile device so that I can manage my medication remotely.
As a patient, I want to be able to view prescriptions on a mobile device so that I can access them anywhere.
As a doctor, I want to be able to use the hospital management system on a mobile device so that I can access the system regardless of my location.
As a doctor, I want to have access to the same functionalities on a mobile device as on a personal computer so that my workflow is consistent.
As a systems analyst, I want appointment start and end times to be recorded so that the average appointment duration can be calculated.
As a system administrator, I want the management system to be accessible only to authorized users so that patient data is protected.
As a system administrator, I want the system to require users to log in to personal accounts so that access can be controlled.
As a doctor, I want data from old management systems to be migrated to the new system so that no medical data is lost.
As a nurse, I want data from old management systems to be migrated to the new system so that no medical data is lost.

use_cases.name: Manage Prescriptions
use_cases.description: Create, transfer, and view electronic prescriptions between doctors, patients, and pharmacists.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a doctor, I want to be able to write prescriptions for patients so that I can provide appropriate medication.
As a doctor, I want to be able to automatically transfer prescriptions to pharmacy information systems so that prescriptions can be processed efficiently.
As a pharmacist, I want to be able to view transferred prescriptions so that I know what medication patients need.
As a patient, I want to be able to view prescriptions written by doctors so that I can use them as a reference when visiting a pharmacy.
As a patient, I want to be able to view prescriptions on a mobile device so that I can access them anywhere.

use_cases.name: Manage Clinical Data
use_cases.description: Collect, store, and access clinical and operational data (e.g., bed occupancy, schedules, appointments) for analytics.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a systems analyst, I want to collect clinical data so that prescriptive and predictive analytics can be performed.
As a systems analyst, I want to have access to collected clinical data so that prescriptive and predictive analytics can be performed.
As a systems analyst, I want to be able to view bed occupancy data so that analytics can be performed on hospital capacity.
As a systems analyst, I want to be able to view room scheduling data so that analytics can be performed.
As a systems analyst, I want to be able to view employee schedules so that predictive analytics can be used to estimate staffing needs.
As a systems analyst, I want to record appointment start and end times so that the average appointment duration can be calculated.

use_cases.name: Integrate Medical Systems
use_cases.description: Store data centrally and integrate electronic medical records and mobile devices with the hospital management system.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a system administrator, I want to store all data in a central database so that discrepancies between departments are reduced.
As a system administrator, I want to integrate electronic medical records with the management system so that patient medical information is digitally available.
As a doctor, I want to integrate mobile devices with electronic medical records so that data collected on mobile devices is stored centrally.

use_cases.name: Manage Data Security
use_cases.description: Enforce privacy, anonymization, access restrictions, and GDPR-compliant protection of patient and system data.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a system administrator, I want to anonymize all data viewed by systems analysts so that patient privacy is ensured.
As a system administrator, I want the system to comply with gdpr standards so that stored data is protected.
As a doctor, I want to restrict patients from viewing information that is not intended for them so that security risks are minimized.
As a system administrator, I want to be able to restrict system components from being viewed by patients so that unauthorized access is prevented.
As a system administrator, I want to be able to grant different access levels to system users so that functionalities can be restricted appropriately.

user_stories.action: restrict system access to authorized users
user_stories.original_sentence: As a system administrator, I want the management system to be accessible only to authorized users so that patient data is protected.

use_cases.name: Authenticate Users
use_cases.description: Require users to log in to personal accounts before accessing the system.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a system administrator, I want the system to require users to log in to personal accounts so that access can be controlled.

use_cases.name: Manage Personal Information
use_cases.description: Allow patients to update and maintain their personal information online.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a patient, I want to be able to edit my personal information online so that my information is up to date.

use_cases.name: View Medical Records
use_cases.description: Provide authorized users with access to patients’ medical history, personal data, EMR content, and test results.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a doctor, I want to be able to view a patient’s medical history so that I can make informed medical decisions.
As a doctor, I want to be able to view a patient’s personal information so that I can correctly identify and treat the patient.
As a nurse, I want to be able to view a patient’s medical history so that I can support medical treatment.
As a nurse, I want to be able to view a patient’s personal information so that I can correctly identify patients.
As a receptionist, I want to be able to view a patient’s electronic medical record so that I have the information needed to contact the patient.
As a patient, I want to be able to access the parts of my electronic medical record that the hospital allows so that I can view my medical information.
As a patient, I want to be able to view my test results once they are available so that I am informed about my health status.
As a patient, I want to be able to access and view my electronic medical record on a mobile device so that I can view my data anywhere.

use_cases.name: Record Patient Notes
use_cases.description: Allow nurses to document and update notes about patient care.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a nurse, I want to be able to record notes about patients so that patient care information is documented.

use_cases.name: Schedule Appointments
use_cases.description: Enable receptionists and patients to create and manage appointments via computer or mobile devices.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a receptionist, I want to be able to schedule appointments so that patient visits can be organized.
As a patient, I want to be able to schedule appointments online on a personal computer so that I can arrange visits conveniently.
As a patient, I want to be able to schedule appointments on a mobile device so that I can manage appointments conveniently.

use_cases.name: Migrate Legacy Data
use_cases.description: Transfer medical and administrative data from old management systems into the new system.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a doctor, I want to migrate data from old management systems to the new system so that no medical data is lost.
As a nurse, I want to migrate data from old management systems to the new system so that no medical data is lost.

use_cases.name: Request Prescriptions
use_cases.description: Allow patients to submit online and mobile requests for new prescriptions.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a patient, I want to be able to request new prescriptions through online appointment scheduling so that I can manage my medication remotely.
As a patient, I want to be able to request new prescriptions on a mobile device so that I can manage my medication remotely.

use_cases.name: Access System Remotely
use_cases.description: Provide doctors with full hospital management system functionality on mobile devices, equivalent to desktop access.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a doctor, I want to be able to use the hospital management system on a mobile device so that I can access the system regardless of my location.
As a doctor, I want to have access to the same functionalities on a mobile device as on a personal computer so that my workflow is consistent.
